title: Czechs plan two-day tourism event
text:
Czechs plan two-day tourism event 12 August 2015 Source: CzechTourism 
Travel Meeting Point has been scheduled for October 20-21 and has been organised by both the countries tour operator associations. 
Exhibitors at the show include national central offices, tour operators and agents, tourist destinations, DMC’s, transport, accommodation and food services, as well as adventure specialists, cruise lines and IT firms. 
A range of ancillary services are also on offer for attendees with meetings being scheduled and language support. 
The event is being run by TTG’s sister publication TTG Czech Republic. 
For more information visit www.ttg.cz or email office@ttg.cz .
